editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: To the President &Directors of the Insurance office of North America

The premium of Drs. 3501 due this day for Insurance effected at your office has never yet been received from the Gentlemen on whose account the business was transacted, having received the order I unriduidthat if I did not execute it I should be liable in case of a loss. I however shall make provision for the debt shortly and must by the favour of your saving the notes from being protested by withdrawing them from the Bank I am very
